text: Giles David Deacon (born 14 December 1969) is a British fashion designer. He is the Creative Director and Founder of Giles Deacon group, a fashion business. Deacon lives in Islington and in Paris. He has been in a relationship with actress Gwendoline Christie since 2013. ==References== Category:British fashion designers Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:People from County Durham
title: Giles Deacon
